abstract: David D. Hiller’s departure came on the same day as the resignation of the editor at another major Tribune Company newspaper, the Chicago Tribune.
snippet: David D. Hiller’s departure came on the same day as the resignation of the editor at another major Tribune Company newspaper, the Chicago Tribune.
lead_paragraph: The upheaval at the Tribune Company continued Monday as the publisher of The Los Angeles Times and the top editor of The Chicago Tribune stepped down, both at a time when their papers were preparing for major redesigns and deep cuts in their newsroom staffs.

headline.main: Two Leaders to Step Down at Tribune Newspapers
headline.print_headline: Two Leaders Stepping Down At Big Tribune Newspapers
